_meta.description: Common CCI (Correct Coding Initiative) bundling pairs
_meta.note: This is a subset of common bundles. Full CCI database updated quarterly by CMS.

45378|45380.description: Colonoscopy with biopsy includes diagnostic colonoscopy
45378|45380.explanation: When biopsy is performed, the work of diagnostic colonoscopy is included

45378|45385.description: Colonoscopy with polypectomy includes diagnostic colonoscopy

45380|45385.description: Polypectomy and biopsy may be separate if different sites
45380|45385.resolution: Use modifier 59 if truly separate sites, otherwise bill 45385 only

99213|99000.resolution: Do not bill 99000 with E/M services

36415|99211.description: Minimal E/M may be bundled with venipuncture
36415|99211.resolution: Generally bill only 36415 unless significant separate E/M

93000|93005.resolution: Bill 93000 for global, OR 93005+93010 for split TC/PC

93000|93010.resolution: Bill 93000 for global, OR 93005+93010 for split TC/PC

99213|36415.explanation: E/M and venipuncture are typically separate services

99214|36415.explanation: E/M and venipuncture are typically separate services

99213|99214.explanation: Cannot bill two E/M codes same provider same day
99213|99214.resolution: Bill the higher level code only
